## useVirtual variable

React hook. Calls [useVirtualModel](./virtual-react.usevirtualmodel.md) and synchronizes it with props

**Signature:**

```typescript
useVirtual: (params: VirtualScrollerInitialParams) => import("@af-utils/virtual-core").VirtualScroller
```
